ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylheptyl Caprylate, Glyceryl Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Citrus Limon Peel Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Brassica Campestris Seed Oil, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter, Cetearyl Glucoside, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Glucose, Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Limonene, Linalool.
